name: firm-client
description: Web Serial + Rust WASM client reading data packets from FIRM

scripts.build:wasm:bundler: wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir pkg --out-name firm_client --no-default-features --features wasm
scripts.build:wasm:web: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg-web --out-name firm_client --no-default-features --features wasm
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm:bundler && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:web: npm run build && npm run build:wasm:web
